context.p: Agents installed in Standalone mode are not managed by a TXOne central management console server. To manually deploy a single configuration to multiple Standalone agents, use an agent configuration file.

title.b: Exporting or Importing a Configuration File

note.p: TXOne encrypts the configuration file before export. Users must decrypt the configuration file before modifying the contents.

step.cmd: Open the TXOne console using the desktop icon (if available) or the Start menu by clicking All Programs TXOne StellarProtect (Legacy Mode)StellarEnforce .
Provide the password and click Log On.
Click the Settings menu item to access the Export/Import Settings section.

choice.p: To export the configuration file as a database (.xen) file:

li.p: Click Export Settings, and choose the location to save the file.
Provide a filename, and click Save.

choice.p: To import the configuration file as a database (.xen) file:

ol.li: Click Import Settings, and locate the database file.

li.p: Select the file, and click Open.

step.cmd: overwrites the existing configuration settings with the settings in the database file.
